description: If you're surprised, you can't move or take an action on your first turn of the combat, and you can't take a reaction until that turn ends. A member of a group can be surprised even if the other members aren't.

parsedEffects_List.details: Cannot move on first turn of combat if surprised.
Cannot take an action on first turn of combat if surprised.
Cannot take a reaction until the first turn of combat ends if surprised.
